DOC.detailed_description: This study enroll 130 pregnant patient undergo C-section fetal surgery EXIT ( Ex Utero Intrapartum Treatment ) procedures epidural general anesthesia low ( 0.75 MAC ) high ( 2.5 MAC ) concentration desflurane . Patients recruit Hospital University Pennsylvania ( 100 C Section ) Children 's Hospital Philadelphia ( 30 EXIT procedure ) . The standard care protocol patient undergo anesthesia case follow throughout surgery . These include monitoring management blood pressure , heart rate rhythm , ventilation , oxygenation , temperature , fluid status . Management parameter discretion clinical team . The choice anesthetic technique also discretion clinical team . Typical anesthetic management include follow : C-section epidural anesthesia : induction maintenance 1.5 % lidocaine , sodium bicarbonate 1:200,000 epinephrine C-section general anesthesia : induction propofol 2 mg/kg succinylcholine 2 mg/kg intravenously ; maintenance desflurane 4.5-5 % EXIT procedure general anesthesia : induction propofol 2 mg/kg succinylcholine 2 mg/kg intravenously ; maintenance desflurane 15-18 % 1 . After baby deliver , umbilicus cut , two ml blood take umbilical vein artery placenta side . A portion blood use blood gas remainder use S100B study assay . 2 . 5 ml blood take mother via exist intravenous catheter . 3 . 5 ml amniotic fluid obtain hysterotomy use S100B study assay . All subject receive standard care post operative clinical care monitoring .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Women deliver child via cesarean section EXIT procedure 2 . Informed consent 1 . Known fetal neurologic defect 2 . Known maternal neurologic abnormality 3 . Sensitivity allergy medication use study 1 . Csection epidural anesthesia : induction maintenance 1.5 % lidocaine , sodium bicarbonate 1:200,000 epinephrine 2 . Csection general anesthesia : induction propofol 2 mg/kg succinylcholine 2 mg/kg intravenously ; maintenance desflurane 4.55 % 3 . EXIT procedure general anesthesia : induction propofol 2 mg/kg succinylcholine 2 mg/kg intravenously ; maintenance desflurane 1518 %
